name: Chain of Doom
description:
For casual gamers(desktop-oriented), who are interested in escapism. The Chain of Doom is a CasualArcade 2D Fishing Game set in the ocean that aims to keep players entertained for hours with its one-of-a-kind concept. The initial idea was inspired by the Baroutrauma game.

The game was made in 8 hours by a group of Games Development students.

GitHub: https://github.com/ShemSkillman/gamejam2021-ball-of-terror
